ValidationRule.description: This validation ensures customer segment information is captured before a specific lead status can be saved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.AutomationBypass__c.SkipValidation__c = false && OR( ISPICKVAL( Status ,'MQL'), ISPICKVAL( Status ,'Sales Lead'), ISPICKVAL( Status ,'SQL') ) && ISPICKVAL (Business_Type__c , 'Consumer') && ISBLANK( TEXT(Property_Type__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a Property Type before saving.
